text: "TV Dinners" is a 1983 song by ZZ Top and is the third single from their eighth studio album Eliminator. It went to number 67 in the United Kingdom and number 38 on the Billboard Mainstream rock chart. It was covered by Robert Palmer for his 14th and final studio album Drive. Category:1983 songs Category:Boogie rock songs Category:ZZ Top songs Category:Robert Palmer songs
title: TV Dinners (song)
